certifications.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in C/C++
Design and Analysis of Algorithms in C

education.school: All Saints Sr. Sec. School, Ajmer

projects.name: SyncSkills
projects.description: Created a resume checker tool that improved keyword relevance, formatting, and ATS compatibility, resulting in a 40% reduction in resume processing time. Created a user-friendly feedback system with customized suggestions, dramatically boosting the quality and effectiveness of user resumes.

projects.name: Skin Disease Detection using Dermoscopic images
projects.description: Engineered an advanced Machine Learning model that accurately identifies and forecasts a range of skin diseases, improving diagnostic accuracy by 30% and increasing access to dermatological care in underserved regions by 50%. Conducted extensive research to gather and curate over 10,000 data points on various skin diseases, creating high-quality datasets that were crucial for training the ML model.

projects.name: Virtual Mouse
projects.description: Developed and launched a pioneering virtual mouse application, pioneering a hands-free interface for computer interaction; optimized user workflow and efficiency, resulting in a 35% increase in task completion speed. Utilized Computer Vision techniques and tools like OpenCV to accurately track and interpret over 95% of real-time hand gestures with a processing speed of 30 frames per second.

experiences.description: Developed and implemented Data Science and Machine Learning models to solve real-world business challenges, focusing on predictive analytics and automation.

Gained hands-on experience in Data Science, Machine Learning, and OpenCV, contributing to the development and testing of data-driven solutions and computer vision projects. Explored AI and ML applications, deepening my interest and understanding of these technologies for solving real-world challenges.

full_output.name: Jatin Acharya
achievements_and_awards: Recipient of the Deans List of Excellence for achieving the Highest GPA in the third, fourth and fifth semesters.
Won first place at MUJHACKX Hackathon for a dermatological diagnostic aid.
Served as Student Placement Coordinator in the AIML Department at Manipal University Jaipur, facilitating job placements and career development.
Awarded a Certificate of Appreciation for exceptional service and leadership within the ACM Student Chapter.
